image.caption: Where 'Ik Marvel' Lived

back.caption: "Edgewood" was the beautiful home of Donald G. Mitchell, author of "Reveries of a Bachelor" and many other interesting books; it has been made famous to thousands of his readers. It is located on Forest Street, Westville, near New Haven. He was born in Norwich, Conn., April 1822, and died Dec. 1908, in Westville
back.text: Feb, 16 '08. I have often been past this place. Have you ever read any of his books? I will look for a letter in the morning. I only worked until light to-night. Have just finished "Life" - The Liars Number - Will send it to-morrow.
